Author: adonut_girl
Text: I do the exact same thing lol..i know it’s sucky, but I feel satisfaction when I see all the people I went to high school who were the “hot, skinny” ones are now heavier than me after I’ve lost a lot of weight and I want them to know it 🙃

Author: katebishophawkguy
Text: i feel this in my soul. i couldn’t give a shit about anyone i went to high school with but it’s so important to me that they know i’m way skinnier now. i literally curate my instagram just in case someone from school looks for me
